#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
int t,n,i,j,max,min,marks,ans;

cin>>t>>n;
for(i=0;i<t;i++)
{ 
  max=0;min=101;
  for(j=0;j<n;j++)
  {
    cin>>marks;
    if(marks<=min)min=marks;
    if(marks>=max)max=marks;
  }  
  ans=max-min;
  cout<<ans<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
